backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list summarizing frontend file purposes for build and review.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Production deployment checklist outlining steps for verifying correct URL, metadata, assets, and load indicator behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme styles defining OKLCH romantic color variables and light/dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry with metadata, canonical URL, caching headers, and script loading for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that redirects incorrect URLs, syncs metadata, logs production checks, and renders the prompt and load indicator.
frontend/src/components/AppLoadedIndicat: Small fixed-position UI element showing app-loaded status, version, and timestamp.
Interactive Valentine prompt with evasive 'No' button logic and success meme reveal using branding text.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralized branding config providing user-facing text like title, description, and messages.
frontend/src/config/publicSiteUrl.ts: Exports canonical site URL and utilities to detect and redirect URLs containing 'mahek'.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a romantic-themed color system with light/dark variants and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/appMetadata.ts: Syncs document title and metadata tags based on branding and the public site URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, typography, and container settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Represents project state, known issues, and feature requirements for fixing publish and metadata alignment issues.
